text: Iganga Boys' Boarding Primary School is located in Iganga District in Uganda along Jinja Road. ==History== Iganga Boys' Boarding Primary School was founded in 1919 by Church Missionary Society.It's now a government aided boys' boarding school covering primary one to primary seven. The student population is 1,000. ==References== Category:Boys' schools in Uganda Category:Boarding schools in Uganda Category:Primary schools in Uganda Category:Educational institutions established in 1919
title: Iganga Boys Boarding Primary School
